description:
Course details


The "Egyptology and Coptology" Course at the State "LMU - University of Munich" Has a Standard Period of 6 Semesters and Ends with the Degree "Bachelor of Arts".The Course is located in Munich.The course is offered as a full-time course.The Course Has Been Rated 4 Times in Total so far.It has received an Average of 4.0 Stars and is Therefore Above the University's Average Rating (3.8 Stars, 3556 ratings in the rating).The Categories of Lecturers, Access to Literature and Course Content Were Rated Particularly Well.

For universities: Create a Study Profile and Adapt the text.

Course details


The "Egyptology and Coptology" Course at the State "LMU - University of Munich" Has a Standard Period of 4 Semesters and Ends with the Degree "Master of Arts".The Course is located in Munich.The course is offered as a full-time course.The Course Has Been Rated 2 Times So Far.It has received an average of 4.2 Stars and is Therefore above the University's Average Rating (3.8 stars, 3556 ratings in the rating).The Categories of Course Content, Equipment and Access to Literature Were Rated Particularly Well.
